select.value: SELECT shihz as shihz, shierdianwuhz as shierdianwuhz, shiliuhz as shiliuhz, ershihz as ershihz, ershiwuhz as ershiwuhz, sanshiyidianwuhz as sanshiyidianwuhz, sishihz as sishihz, wushihz as wushihz, liushisanhz as liushisanhz, bashihz as bashihz, yibaihz as yibaihz, yibaiershiwuhz as yibaiershiwuhz, yibailiushihz as yibailiushihz, erbaihz as erbaihz, erbaiwushihz as erbaiwushihz, sanbaiyishiwuhz as sanbaiyishiwuhz, sibaihz as sibaihz, wubaihz as wubaihz, liubaisanshihz as liubaisanshihz, babaihz as babaihz, yiqianhz as yiqianhz, yiqianerbaiwushihz as yiqianerbaiwushihz, yiqianliubaihz as yiqianliubaihz, erqianhz as erqianhz, erqianwubaihz as erqianwubaihz, sanqianyibaiwushihz as sanqianyibaiwushihz, siqianhz as siqianhz, wuqianhz as wuqianhz, liuqiansanbaihz as liuqiansanbaihz, baqianhz as baqianhz, yiwanhz as yiwanhz FROM zbgl_zxsy_cedian where {#condition#}
